name: next-multilingual
description: An opinionated end-to-end solution for Next.js applications that requires multiple languages.
author: Avansai (https://avansai.com)

scripts.start-example: npm run build && cd example && npm run dev
scripts.start-example-build: npm run build && cd example && npm run build && npm run start
scripts.e2e:base-path: cross-env BASE_PATH=/some-path CYPRESS_basePath=/some-path start-server-and-test start-example http://localhost:3000/some-path cypress
scripts.e2e:headless:base-path: cross-env BASE_PATH=/some-path CYPRESS_basePath=/some-path start-server-and-test start-example http://localhost:3000/some-path cypress:headless
scripts.e2e:build: cross-env CYPRESS_isProd=true start-server-and-test start-example-build http://localhost:3000 cypress
scripts.e2e:build:base-path: cross-env CYPRESS_isProd=true BASE_PATH=/some-path CYPRESS_basePath=/some-path start-server-and-test start-example-build http://localhost:3000/some-path cypress
scripts.e2e:build:headless: cross-env CYPRESS_isProd=true start-server-and-test start-example-build http://localhost:3000 cypress:headless
scripts.e2e:build:headless:base-path: cross-env CYPRESS_isProd=true BASE_PATH=/some-path CYPRESS_basePath=/some-path start-server-and-test start-example-build http://localhost:3000/some-path cypress:headless
scripts.tests: npm run e2e:headless && echo   ☝️ normal dev run && cross-env echo && pause && npm run e2e:headless:base-path && echo   ☝️ dev run with base path && cross-env echo && pause && npm run e2e:build:headless && echo   ☝️ normal build run && cross-env echo && pause && npm run e2e:build:headless:base-path && echo   ☝️ build run with base path
